hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Regime Transition via 20D/50D SMA Death Cross with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence >55%), a bearish regime transition will occur within 5 days if: (1) BTC price crosses below both 20-day and 50-day SMAs, (2) 5-day average volume exceeds 30-day average by >15%, and (3) daily RSI(14) drops below 45 from above 55.
hypothesis_content.rationale: NEUTRAL regimes represent equilibrium; breakdowns with volume confirmation signal institutional distribution. SMA confluence provides technical validity. RSI momentum shift confirms bearish pressure.
entry_conditions: BTC price < 20D SMA AND BTC price < 50D SMA
Daily RSI(14) crosses below 45 from above 55 within last 24h

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BEAR (confidence >60%) OR 8% price decline from entry
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days after entry without regime transition

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: >40% of signals fail to produce BEAR regime within 5 days OR false signals exceed 35% when backtested across 2021-2024 cycles.
